entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
